alert.note: Alert for Northern St. Tammany; Washington (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 3:28PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHEASTERN ST. TAMMANY, SOUTHEASTERN WASHINGTON PARISHES IN SOUTHEASTERN LOUISIANA AND SOUTHWESTERN PEARL RIVER COUNTIES THROUGH 415 PM CDT... At 328 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Sun, or 10 miles northwest of Picayune, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Picayune, Sun, and Bush. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 59 in Louisiana between mile markers 9 and 11. Interstate 59 in Mississippi near mile marker 1. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
